mapper.select: SELECT A.LM_LotNo LotNo, A.LM_ItemCode ItemCode, B.Product_Item_Name ItemName, B.Product_Info_STND_1 ItemSTND1, B.Product_Info_STND_2 ItemSTND2, D.Cus_Name ClientName FROM LotMaster_tbl A inner join Product_Info_tbl B on A.LM_ItemCode = B.Product_Item_Code left outer join InMat_tbl C on A.LM_LotNo = C.InMat_Lot_No and C.InMat_No = '1' inner join Customer_tbl D on C.InMat_Client_Code = D.Cus_Code and A.LM_LotNo = #{LotNo}

SELECT A.Small_Packaging_LotNo, A.ItemCode, B.Product_Item_Name ItemName, sum(A.Qty) Qty, B.Product_Info_STND_1 ItemSTND1, B.Product_Info_STND_2 ItemSTND2, C.Child_TBL_Type ItemMaterial_Name, D.Child_TBL_Type ItemClsfc1_Name, E.Child_TBL_Type ItemClsfc2_Name FROM Small_Packaging_tbl A inner join Product_Info_tbl B on A.ItemCode = B.Product_Item_Code inner join DTL_TBL C on B.Product_Material = C.Child_TBL_No inner join DTL_TBL D on B.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = D.Child_TBL_No inner join DTL_TBL E on B.Product_Item_CLSFC_2 = E.Child_TBL_No where A.Small_Packaging_LotNo = #{Small_Packaging_LotNo} group by A.Small_Packaging_LotNo

SELECT A.Sales_Large_Packing_LotNo Small_Packaging_LotNo, A.Sales_ItemCode ItemCode, B.Product_Item_Name ItemName, sum(A.Sales_Packing_Qty) Qty, B.Product_Info_STND_1 ItemSTND1, B.Product_Info_STND_2 ItemSTND2, C.Child_TBL_Type ItemMaterial_Name, D.Child_TBL_Type ItemClsfc1_Name, E.Child_TBL_Type ItemClsfc2_Name FROM Sales_Packing_tbl A inner join Product_Info_tbl B on A.Sales_ItemCode = B.Product_Item_Code inner join DTL_TBL C on B.Product_Material = C.Child_TBL_No inner join DTL_TBL D on B.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = D.Child_TBL_No inner join DTL_TBL E on B.Product_Item_CLSFC_2 = E.Child_TBL_No where A.Sales_Large_Packing_LotNo = #{Sales_Large_Packing_LotNo} group by A.Sales_Large_Packing_LotNo
